description: Evrett, Quaid, and Bellini hang from the rafters like sling-bound pinatas while Ward and Nicaste play between their grease covered cheeks. Ward fists Quaid with one arm and plows Evrett with his other. Nicaste takes Bellini in one hand and, after Ward leaves him vacant for a moment, takes a poke at Evrett before losing his load.
title: Fist for Hire 1, Scene #04
